TER.TERdecoder.BPEDecoder
Class RecommendedDecoding

java.lang.Object
  TER.TERdecoder.BPEDecoder.RecommendedDecoding

public class RecommendedDecoding
extends java.lang.Object

This class decodes an input stream according to the Recommendation for image data compression of the CCSDS.
Usage example:
  construct
  set parameters
  run
  get functions

Version:
1.2
Author:
Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)

Field Detail

parametersSet

boolean parametersSet
To know if parameters are set.

True indicates that they are set otherwise false.

zSize

int zSize
Number of image channels.

The Recommendation only allows one channel images to be encoded.

recoveredSamples

float[][][] recoveredSamples
Recovered image samples (index meaning [z][y][x]).

All values allowed.
